Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

Version 0.2.2

CRAN release: 2025-11-03

  • Updated check for contiguous regions

Version 0.2.1

CRAN release: 2025-09-29

  • Updated deprecated argument in igraph::bfs() function

Version 0.2.0

CRAN release: 2020-07-10

  • Introduce create_island() function, which allows the user to add island tiles to the layout of an existing tile map.
